articles.description: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery may not believe his team are Premier League title contenders - but he is "dreaming" of Europa League glory after reaching the last 16.
articles.title: Aston Villa: Unai Emery 'dreaming' of winning Europa League after reaching last 16

articles.description: Nottingham Forest's hopes of a top-eight finish in the Europa League - and a straight route to the last 16 - are hanging by a thread after a one costly minute leads to defeat by Sporting Braga.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: Europa League hopes in balance after 55 costly seconds in Braga

articles.description: England change formats and opponents, yet still follow their dismal Ashes campaign with defeat by Sri Lanka in the first one-day international in Colombo.
articles.title: Sri Lanka vs England: Harry Brook's side lose first ODI in Colombo

articles.description: Martin O'Neill praised his team for claiming a draw in Italy, but big tests are still to come.
articles.title: Celtic show 'spirit' & 'resilience' in Bologna as big week looms

articles.description: BBC Sport Scotland examines Rangers' turn in fortunes recently under Danny Rohl.
articles.title: Mr Consistent: Has Danny Rohl turned Rangers' ship around?

articles.description: Manchester United say midfielder Casemiro will leave the club when his contract expires at the end of this season.
articles.title: Casemiro: Man Utd's Brazil midfielder to leave club this summer

articles.description: Mohamed Salah and Vinicius Jr are prime targets for Saudi Pro League, Crystal Palace hold talks with Wolves over move for Jorgen Strand Larsen, Chelsea consider loan deal for Douglas Luiz, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Salah, Vinicius Jr, Strand Larsen, Luiz, Elliot, Sargent, Lucca, Alao

articles.description: Aston Villa are through to the Europa League last 16 already - but with one round of matches to play in the league phase, only two of the other three British sides have a chance of joining them.
articles.title: Who can join Aston Villa in Europa League last 16?

articles.description: The Football Supporters' Association criticises Fifa president Gianni Infantino for making a "cheap" joke about British fans' behaviour at World Cups.
articles.title: Gianni Infantino: Fifa president criticised for 'cheap' joke about British fans' behaviour

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on actor Éanna Hardwicke, who plays Roy Keane in the new film Saipan - and AI - with his predictions for this week's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v 'Roy Keane' - Saipan star Éanna Hardwicke - and AI
